Evacuation shelters are anticipated to remain open until power can be restored and transportation arranged back to the respective cities. Officials say in preparation for Hurricane Laura, instead of moving to bigger locations, Red Cross had double the amount of shelters ready in some counties to allow for extra space between evacuees.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-007_general_Where can displaced people find emergency housing?

factText: Tyson Foods is providing more than one million meals, ice, and other supplies in response to areas affected by Hurricane Laura. One of the immediate needs following Hurricane Laura is for bottled water. Whatever you need, we have it! Take a look around Five Star Feeds as we have many supplies that you will need during our recovery from Hurricane Laura.
11 people are dead after Hurricane Laura, and hundreds of thousands are still without power or water. Thousands have lost everything due to Hurricane Laura. If you'd like to help, here's how

factText: More than 24 hours after Hurricane Laura made landfall, some communities in coastal Louisiana remain cut off from help because of flooded roads. Boddeker Road, which runs along the ship channel out to East Beach, will be closed beginning today as crews clean up debris and sand that washed over the road during Hurricane Laura. Interstate 10 and Interstate 20 in Lake Charles remain closed due to storm damage and a chemical fire that erupted Thursday.

Our National Response Coordination Center is where federal agencies come together to support disasters like Hurricane #Laura. Emergency Disaster Services has come to Shreveport, Louisiana to help with Hurricane Laura disasters. “The Coast Guard has deployed more than 3,000 service members, 32 aircraft crews and nearly 40 boat crews to respond to flooded and damaged areas that were affected by Hurricane Laura along the Louisi

Gov. Edwards is requesting a major disaster declaration for 23 parishes in Louisiana impacted by Hurricane Laura, including Natchitoches, Sabine, Bienville, Claiborne, and Red River. The Governor also announced that he has declared a State of Prepareness for all 55 counties from today through Sunday due to possible flooding from Hurricane Laura.

Hurricane Laura has left behind a trail of damage in Lake Charles, Louisiana. The aftermath shows uprooted trees and downed power lines.

factText: DONATION DRIVE FOR HURRICANE LAURA VICTIMS: Items that will be accepted include: Flashlights, Batteries, Cleaning supplies, Industrial trash bags, Basic medical supplies, Tarps, Roofing nails,Tools, D. ⚜️⚜️those Interested in dropping off supplies for Hurricane Laura affected areas⚜️⚜️ All supplies: fuel, tarps, food, water, etc, are being collected at the Westlake PD tomorrow & Sunday!.
